data.content: <p style="margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; line-height: 25px; background: white;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px; color: red;">品牌介绍</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: red;">  </span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">Brand Introduction</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">  </span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);">..........................................................................................</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);">CO-MALL</span></strong><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; line-height: 25px; background: white;"><span style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">广东乐百氏集团是闻名全国的大型食品饮料企业，是法国达能集团旗下企业，中国饮料工业十强企业之一，广东省第二批重点发展大型企业集团之一，中山市工业十五强企业之首，产品商标“乐百氏”是中国食品饮料行业目前为数不多的经</span><span style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">国家商标局</span><span style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">认定的“</span><span style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">驰名商标</span><span style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">”。乐百氏集团前身为广东今日集团，创办于1989年，今日集团正式成立于1992年10月。1999年8月，集团管理中心从中山迁到广州；10月，今日集团更名乐百氏集团。</span><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; line-height: 25px; background: white;"><strong><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);"><br/></span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 18px; color: red;">产品信息</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: red;">  </span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">Product Infomation</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">  </span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);">..........................................................................................</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);">CO-MALL</span></strong><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; line-height: 25px; background: white;"><span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-size: 14px;"><strong style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">商品名称：</strong><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">达能 脉动维生素饮料（青柠口味）</span><br style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;"/><strong style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">规格：</strong><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;"> 600毫升</span><br style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;"/><strong style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">配料：</strong><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">水、白砂糖、果葡糖浆、苹果汁、食用香精、食品添加剂（柠檬酸、维生素C、柠檬酸钠、醋酸、蔗糖素、抗氧化剂 386）、烟酰胺、维生素B6、维生素B12</span><br style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;"/><strong style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">贮存条件：</strong><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">阴凉干燥处，避免阳光直射</span><br style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;"/><strong style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">保质期（常温）：</strong><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 24px;">10个月</span></span><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; line-height: 25px; background: white;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);"></span><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; white-space: normal; line-height: 25px; background: white;"><strong><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);"><br/></span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 18px; color: red;">产品展示</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: red;">  </span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">Product View</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">           </span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);">..........................................................................................</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);">CO-MALL</span></strong><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);">                                               <br/><img src="http://124.193.192.92:8082/assets/upload/1449569750158.jpg"/></span>
data.name: 达能 脉动维生素饮料 青柠口味 /水蜜桃味 600ml/瓶
